00001 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00002 //Description: 1. Setup Cdc geometry and manage associated sensitive detectors
00003 //             2. Communicate with associated sensitive detectors
00004 //Author: Wu Chen(wuchen@mail.ihep.ac.cn)
00005 //Created: 26 Aug, 2014
00006 //Comment: The units are "mm"(default), "um"(for wire radius) and "rad". 
00007 //Comment: Datum plain is upstream end plate of CDC
00008 //Comment: fVerboseLevel: 0:    Just Warning Messages and Error Messages
00009 //                        1:    + Dump()
00010 //                        >= 5: All informations
00011 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------//

00035 CdcGeometrySvc::CdcGeometrySvc(G4String name, G4String opt )
00036         : SimpleGeometrySvc(name, "S") // Use a not-empty opt to stop inherited class from creating new GeometryParameter
00037 {
00038         if ( opt == "" ){//called directly by user. set up parameter class.
00039                 CdcGeometryParameter *pointer = new CdcGeometryParameter(name);
00040                 //              std::cout<<"======>In CdcGeometrySvc, new CdcGeometryParameter at ("<<(void*)pointer<<")!"<<std::endl;
00041                 set_GeometryParameter(pointer);
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 CdcGeometrySvc::~CdcGeometrySvc(){
00046         printf("~CdcGeometrySvc");
00047 }

00049 //------------------------Modify-------------------------------
00050 void CdcGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter( CdcGeometryParameter* val ){
00051         m_GeometryParameter = val;
00052         SimpleGeometrySvc::set_GeometryParameter(m_GeometryParameter);
00053 }

00055 //---------------------------SetGeometry---------------------------------
00056 //
00057 G4VPhysicalVolume* CdcGeometrySvc::SetGeometry(){
00058         m_GeometryParameter->Dump();
00059         ConstructVolumes();
00060         G4VPhysicalVolume *current = PlaceVolumes();
00061         return current;
00062 }
00063 
00064 //-------------------------Special functions-----------------------------
00065 //=> ConstructVolumes
00066 void CdcGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes(){
00067         SimpleGeometrySvc::ConstructVolumes();
00068         bool vis;
00069         double r, g, b;
00070 
00071         //*******************Construct Cells and wires***********************
00072         //get general info
00073         bool checkOverlap = m_GeometryParameter->get_checkoverlap();
00074         G4String MVol_name = m_GeometryParameter->get_MotherLogicalVolume();
00075         G4String SD_name = m_GeometryParameter->get_SensitiveDetector();
00076         G4String SDVolumeName = m_GeometryParameter->get_SDVolumeName();
00077         G4String CellMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_CellMaterial();
00078         G4double MinStepLength = m_GeometryParameter->get_MinStepLength();
00079         G4LogicalVolume* log_CdcContainer = get_logicalVolume(MVol_name);
00080         G4UserLimits* stepLimit = new G4UserLimits(m_GeometryParameter->get_MinStepLength());
00081         log_CdcContainer->SetUserLimits(stepLimit);
00082         //get wire info
00083         G4double SignalWireR=m_GeometryParameter->get_FieldWireRadius();
00084         G4double FieldWireR=m_GeometryParameter->get_SignalWireRadius();
00085         G4String signalWireMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_SignalWireMaterial();
00086         G4String fieldWireMatName=m_GeometryParameter->get_FieldWireMaterial();
00087         G4Material *SignalWireMat, *FieldWireMat, *CellMat;
00088         SignalWireMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(signalWireMatName);
00089         FieldWireMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(fieldWireMatName);
00090         CellMat = G4Material::GetMaterial(CellMatName);
00091         if (!SignalWireMat || !FieldWireMat || !CellMat ){
00092                 std::cout<<"In CdcGeometrySvc, Material is not defined!"<<std::endl;
00093                 G4Exception("CdcGeometrySvc::SetGeometry()",
00094                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00095                                 "unknown material name");
00096         }
00097         //visual option
00098         bool svis, fvis;
00099         double sr, sg, sb, fr, fg, fb;
00100         svis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis_SignalWire();
00101         fvis = m_GeometryParameter->get_vis_FieldWire();
00102         sr = m_GeometryParameter->get_r_SignalWire();
00103         sg = m_GeometryParameter->get_g_SignalWire();
00104         sb = m_GeometryParameter->get_b_SignalWire();
00105         fr = m_GeometryParameter->get_r_FieldWire();
00106         fg = m_GeometryParameter->get_g_FieldWire();
00107         fb = m_GeometryParameter->get_b_FieldWire();
00108 
00109         //loop in layers
00110         G4int    layerNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_LayerNo();      
00111         //      for( int layerId = 0; layerId < 1; layerId++ ){
00112         for( int layerId = 0; layerId < layerNo; layerId++ ){
00113                 //set useful variables
00114                 G4LogicalVolume* log_SignalWire, *log_FieldWire;
00115                 G4String Name;
00116                 G4double outR, innerR, halfzlen;
00117                 G4double startAngle, spanAngle;
00118                 double holeDphi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_holeDphi(layerId);
00119                 double angle4rotate = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4rotate(layerId);
00120                 double angle4stereo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_angle4stereo(layerId);
00121                 //====>Get logical volumes for Wire
00122                 startAngle=0.*deg;
00123                 spanAngle=360.*deg;
00124                 innerR = 0.;
00125                 halfzlen = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_length(layerId)/cos(angle4stereo) - FieldWireR;
00126                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >=10 ){
00127                         std::cout<<"sol_Wire: innerR = "<<innerR/mm
00128                                 <<"mm, halfzlen = "<<halfzlen/mm
00129                                 <<"mm, startAngle = "<<startAngle/rad
00130                                 <<"rad, spanAngle = "<<spanAngle/rad
00131                                 <<"rad"
00132                                 <<std::endl;
00133                 }
00134                 //get layer info
00135                 Name="CdcWire";
00136                 G4int layer_type = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_type(layerId);
00137                 G4Tubs* sol_FieldWire=new G4Tubs(Name,innerR,FieldWireR,halfzlen,startAngle,spanAngle);
00138                 log_FieldWire = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_FieldWire, FieldWireMat,Name,0,0,0);
00139                 //visual option
00140                 if (!fvis){
00141                         log_FieldWire->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00142                 }
00143                 else{
00144                         G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00145                         visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00146                         visAttributes->SetColour(fr,fg,fb);
00147                         log_FieldWire->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00148                 }
00149                 if (layer_type == 1 || layer_type == 2){
00150                         G4Tubs* sol_SignalWire=new G4Tubs(Name,innerR,SignalWireR,halfzlen,startAngle,spanAngle);
00151                         log_SignalWire = new G4LogicalVolume(sol_SignalWire, SignalWireMat,Name,0,0,0);
00152                         //visual option
00153                         if (!svis){
00154                                 log_SignalWire->SetVisAttributes(G4VisAttributes::Invisible);
00155                         }
00156                         else{
00157                                 G4VisAttributes* visAttributes = new G4VisAttributes;
00158                                 visAttributes->SetVisibility(true);
00159                                 visAttributes->SetColour(sr,sg,sb);
00160                                 log_SignalWire->SetVisAttributes(visAttributes);
00161                         }
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 //====>Place wires in this layer
00165                 int HoleNo = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_HoleNo(layerId);
00166                 G4ThreeVector centerVec(1.,1.,1.);
00167                 double layer_Rc = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_Rc(layerId);
00168                 //              for ( int cellId = 0; cellId < 1; cellId++ ){
00169                 for ( int holeId = 0; holeId < HoleNo; holeId++ ){
00170                         //place cell
00171                         G4double SPhi = m_GeometryParameter->get_layer_SPhi(layerId);
00172                         G4double phi = SPhi + holeId*holeDphi + angle4rotate/2;
00173                         G4LogicalVolume* log_wire;
00174                         if ( (layer_type == 1 || layer_type == 2) && holeId%2 == 1 ){
00175                                 log_wire = log_SignalWire;
00176                         }
00177                         else{
00178                                 log_wire = log_FieldWire;
00179                         }
00180                         centerVec.setMag(layer_Rc);
00181                         centerVec.setTheta(pi/2);
00182                         centerVec.setPhi(phi);
00183                         G4RotationMatrix* rotMatrix=new G4RotationMatrix();
00184                         rotMatrix->rotateZ(-phi);       
00185                         rotMatrix->rotateX(angle4stereo);
00186                         new G4PVPlacement(rotMatrix,centerVec,log_wire,Name,log_CdcContainer,false,0,checkOverlap);
00187                 }
00188         }//end loop in layers
00189 }
00190 
00191 //=>Place Volumes
00192 G4VPhysicalVolume* CdcGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes(){
00193         G4VPhysicalVolume* world_pvol = 0;
00194         G4VPhysicalVolume *former = SimpleGeometrySvc::PlaceVolumes();
00195         if (!world_pvol) world_pvol=former;
00196         return world_pvol;
00197 }
